Circulars for website(Cicular) 
NO.CAS-10(3)/2007/Div.I 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING (I-III Floor), JANPATH BHAVAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated : 4/09/2008 
 
 
Circular No. 05/2008 
 
 
Subject : Separate queue for security check of  pax for International flights: 
 
 
Of late it has been observed that passengers traveling by International 
flights stand in the same queue along with domestic passengers at some airports 
where there is no separate Sterile Hold Area/Screening Area for such passengers.  
 
2. 
In order to avoid mixing of the passengers of International Flights with 
those of domestic flights, it is instructed that separate “queue” may be made for 
such passengers at the gate of Sterile Hold Area. Airport operators may take 
necessary measures   by installing equipment, enhancing manpower etc. to ensure 
the same. 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
